channel.title: [HELP] How do i remove stuff like stairs
channel.description:
Well, i am making a server. and i really need help on how to remove the normal map things. like. Doors,staircase's,Tables aswell as chairs.
There will may be a reward for mod on my server IF you would be able to help me.
Regards, iDuffy

item.title: [HELP] How do i remove stuff like stairs
item.dc:creator: @sjoukjeowns sjoukjeowns
item.description:
@sjoukjeowns wrote:

[quote=“iDuffy, post:7, topic:326435”][quote author=Pure Demons link=topic=422847.msg3104152#msg3104152 date=1263992259]

Go in your client.Java
Search for “Newobject()”

And delete the Object you wanna delete

EXAMPLE :

         makeGlobalObject(2856, 9777, 11758, -2, 10);// Bank

No you nerd, that’s for objects someone else put there, not the default RuneScape objects.
Try deletethatObject(XCoords, YCoords);
[/quote]

Thankyou so much,
you will be first mod on my server ;)[/quote]
deletethatobject(2785, 4767); //something

2785=x coordinate
4767=y coordinate
//u can put anything behind it if u delete a wall for a train place put in //train or //wall:)

makeGlobalObject(2961, 3388, 409, -1, 10); //Prayer Alter
2961=x coordinate
3388=y coordinate
409=object id
rest is not needed
when u put a object on a place were is already something first use delethatobject and then makeobject,

This is some easy tip for you,

Read full topic
item.source: [HELP] How do i remove stuff like stairs

Go in your client.Java
Search for “Newobject()”

And delete the Object you wanna delete

EXAMPLE :

         makeGlobalObject(2856, 9777, 11758, -2, 10);// Bank

[/quote]

No you nerd, that’s for objects someone else put there, not the default RuneScape objects.
Try deletethatObject(XCoords, YCoords);[/quote]

Thankyou so much,
you will be first mod on my server
